headline.sub: Stocks flat as job growth stalls
headline.main: Stocks flat as job growth stalls

docs.snippet: Summary:  Stocks were little changed as investors discount dismal hiring in December; homebuilders rally as debt yields tumble; Target security breach bigger and wider than first revealed.  Conway G. Gittens reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Summary:  Stocks were little changed as investors discount dismal hiring in December; homebuilders rally as debt yields tumble; Target security breach bigger and wider than first revealed.  Conway G. Gittens reports.

headline.print_headline: Tips for Consumers Worried About the Target Breach
headline.main: Tips for Consumers Worried About the Target Breach

docs.snippet: Target said Friday that its massive pre-Christmas security breach affected potentially millions more people than it previously thought....
docs.lead_paragraph: Target said Friday that its massive pre-Christmas security breach affected potentially millions more people than it previously thought.

headline.print_headline: Zucker: GOP Being Run From Fox News Headquarters
headline.main: Zucker: GOP Being Run From Fox News Headquarters

docs.snippet: The chiefs of CNN and Fox News Channel are throwing shots at each other, each suggesting the other's network is essentially out of the news business....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chiefs of CNN and Fox News Channel are throwing shots at each other, each suggesting the other's network is essentially out of the news business.

headline.print_headline: Former Reagan Spokesman Larry Speakes Dies at 74
headline.main: Former Reagan Spokesman Larry Speakes Dies at 74

docs.snippet: Larry Speakes, who spent six years as acting press secretary for President Ronald Reagan, died Friday in his native Mississippi. He was 74....
docs.lead_paragraph: Larry Speakes, who spent six years as acting press secretary for President Ronald Reagan, died Friday in his native Mississippi. He was 74.

headline.print_headline: For Stocks, Earnings Take Center Stage
headline.main: For Stocks, Earnings Take Center Stage

docs.snippet: After the S&P 500's impressive 30 percent return in 2013, Wall Street will get a better picture of reality next week as the pace of companies reporting earnings picks up....
docs.lead_paragraph: After the S&P 500's impressive 30 percent return in 2013, Wall Street will get a better picture of reality next week as the pace of companies reporting earnings picks up.

docs.snippet: The United Nations has sent out invitations to an international summit to address the conflict in Syria, called Geneva Two, which is scheduled to begin on Jan. 22 in Montreux, Switzerland....
docs.abstract: The United Nations has sent out invitations to an international summit to address the conflict in Syria, called Geneva Two, which is scheduled to begin on Jan. 22 in Montreux, Switzerland.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD, LIAM STACK and HEATHER MURPHY

headline.print_headline: Treasury: Volunteer Firefighters Exempt Under ACA
headline.main: Treasury: Volunteer Firefighters Exempt Under ACA

docs.snippet: Fire departments won't have to provide coverage to volunteer firefighters under the federal health care law, the U.S. Department of Treasury said Friday, easing concerns that the overhaul would force departments to slash volunteer hours or benefit...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fire departments won't have to provide coverage to volunteer firefighters under the federal health care law, the U.S. Department of Treasury said Friday, easing concerns that the overhaul would force departments to slash volunteer hours or benefits.

headline.print_headline: Kiffin Joins Alabama as Offensive Coordinator
headline.main: Kiffin Joins Alabama as Offensive Coordinator

docs.snippet: Alabama hired former Southern California coach Lane Kiffin on Friday as its offensive coordinator and quarterbacks coach....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alabama hired former Southern California coach Lane Kiffin on Friday as its offensive coordinator and quarterbacks coach.

headline.print_headline: Clark Withdraws From Sony Open With Elbow Injury
headline.main: Clark Withdraws From Sony Open With Elbow Injury

docs.snippet: South African Tim Clark pulled out of the Sony Open in Honolulu on Friday because of an elbow injury before he was scheduled to tee off in the second round....
docs.lead_paragraph: South African Tim Clark pulled out of the Sony Open in Honolulu on Friday because of an elbow injury before he was scheduled to tee off in the second round.

headline.main: Stop Asking Me for My Email Address

docs.snippet: If you can’t tell me how my personal information is going to be protected when you ask for it, don’t expect me to give it you. And you should do the same when someone asks you....
docs.abstract: If you can’t tell me how my personal information is going to be protected when you ask for it, don’t expect me to give it you. And you should do the same when someone asks you.
